snippet.title: THE BLUENESS OF A WOUND TRAILER
snippet.description:
First look at the mystery/adventure game set in the Blue Mountains. Coming soon to PC.

Haunted by a tragic event that led to the loss of her sister, Lana is a young woman who returns to the place of her nightmares to exact revenge. That place is the Blue Mountains, which according to the stories of the Dreamtime is where the omnipotent Rainbow Serpeant lives. To get the answers she seeks Lana will have to venture deep into the dark valleys of the mountains where the killer lurks and forces from the beginning of time still hold dominion.

FOR MORE INFO GO TO
www.zaperart.com/blue
